text: Maintenance schedule unpredictable hai.
Transformer repair me weeks lag gaye, notification nahi di.
Line replacement me leaks hone ke baad bhi action nahi liya gaya.
Repair ka cost estimate pehle batao, surprise charges nahi hone chahiye.
Crew behaviour kharab tha, rude communication hui.
Rooftop solar installation guidelines clear nahi hain.
Net-metering benefits ke baare mein koi information nahi mili.
Green tariff choose karna hai, process kaise hai?
Solar panel subsidy apply karne mein problem aa rahi hai.
Renewable energy plans mehngi pad rahi hain compared to regular.
Carbon footprint reduce ka promise sab karte hain but action nahi.
EV charging station availability bahut limited hai.
Community solar projects ke updates chahiye the.
Green energy options ke liye longer contract periods hain.
Customer care number unreachable hai, line busy rehta hai.
Chatbot se resolution nahi milti, agent connect kar do.
SMS alerts timely nahi aate, outage ke baare mein late pata chalta hai.
Emails ka reply 10 days baad aata hai.
Support staff Hindi nahi bol paate, English only.
Complaint registration process complicated hai.
Follow-up calls promised but nahi kiye gaye.
Service status updates website pe outdated hain.
Feedback form down hai, submit nahi ho raha.
